text: NBA Jam is an arcade basketball video game. The game was released in 1993. It was both developed and published by Midway. The gameplay for NBA Jam is based on the 1989 video game Arch Rivals, which was another 2-on-2 basketball video game. The game is very popular in popular culture. In the game if you enter a specific code you can unlock Bill Clinton. It is 2 on 2 arcade basketball. ==References== Category:1993 video games Category:Midway video games Category:Sports video games Category:Atari Jaguar games Category:Game Boy games Category:Game Gear games Category:Sega Genesis games Category:Sega CD games Category:Super Nintendo Entertainment System games
title: NBA Jam (1993 video game)
